#summary Google API Client samples
#sidebar TableOfContents

There are a number of samples included in the Google API PHP Client library that demonstrate the basic functions using the Google Buzz API, as well as doing high-fidelity rendering of buzz posts, you can find these in the google-api-php-client/examples directory. 

You can also view a live version of these samples at [http://www.buzz-demos.com buzz-demos.com]

[http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/source/browse/#svn/trunk/examples Examples source]

Additional sample code is available for a number of APIs, as listed below.
<wiki:toc />
